description: A deliciously spiced pasta sauce with salty chorizo.
name: Pasta with Chorizo in a Capsicum Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and sliced
400g pasta, cooked as per packet instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Place the capsicum, onion and garlic on a roasting tray, drizzle with oil and roast for 20 minutes.
While the vegetables are roasting, cook the pasta as per packet instructions and the drain and set to one side.
Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the chorizo for 5 minutes turning occasionally.
Remove the vegetables from the oven and remove the skin from the capsicum.
Add the capsicum flesh and other veg to a blender with the cream, salt, and chilli and blend until smooth.
Once blended, add the sauce to the pan with the chorizo and cook while stirring for 5 minutes.
Add the pasta to the pan and combine while cooking for 5 minutes before serving.
